item.title: 美联储降息押注破灭，债券交易员为就业报告做好准备
item.description: 债券投资者正在关注周四的美国劳动力市场报告，预计该报告将扼杀或重燃美联储下月降息的减弱预期。【原文：Bond investors are zeroing in on Thursday’s US labor market report, which is expected to either kill or rekindle waning expectations for a Federal Reserve interest rate cut next month.】

item.title: 台湾太阳保险公司斥资 5.4 亿美元重振旗鼓
item.description: 玉山金融控股公司（E.Sun Financial Holding Co.）计划注资至少 5 亿美元，以重振其正在收购的一家陷入困境的人寿保险公司，这也是该公司在竞争日益激烈的台湾金融业中崭露头角的雄心壮志的一部分。【原文：E.Sun Financial Holding Co. plans to inject at least half a billion dollars to revive a struggling life insurance firm it is acquiring, as part of its broader ambition to become a more prominent player in Taiwan’s increasingly competitive financial sector.】

item.title: 英伟达黄晓明称公司有大量新芯片可售

item.title: 根据即将发布的特朗普命令，各州的人工智能法律将受到挑战
item.description: 根据一份在 K 街和国会山传得沸沸扬扬的、彭博社政府部门也看到的草案，唐纳德-特朗普总统正准备签署一项行政命令，允许司法部就其认为违宪的人工智能法规起诉各州。【原文：President Donald Trump is preparing to sign an executive order that would allow the Department of Justice to sue states over artificial intelligence regulations it deems unconstitutional, according to a draft making the rounds on K Street, Capitol Hill, and seen by Bloomberg Government.】

item.title: 英国零售商协会（BRC）称，里夫斯预算案公布前英国消费者信心下滑
item.description: 英国零售商协会（British Retail Consortium）称，由于政府在本月预算中暗示将提高所得税，导致人们对经济和个人财务状况感到担忧，英国消费者信心在 11 月份出现下滑。【原文：UK consumer confidence tumbled in November, the British Retail Consortium said, as government hints about higher income tax in this month’s budget caused people to worry about the economy and their personal finances.】

item.title: 亚洲降息幅度最大 菲律宾债券将反弹
item.description: 菲律宾债券有望进一步上涨，因为政治不确定性导致投资者预计，与亚洲新兴国家相比，菲律宾将采取最积极的降息措施。【原文：Philippine bonds are poised for further gains as political uncertainties lead investors to anticipate some of the most aggressive interest rate cuts in the nation compared with its emerging Asian peers.】

item.title: 尽管大盘显示出风险偏好，黄金仍在上涨
item.description: 黄金在近期下跌后继续收复失地，表明尽管更广泛的金融市场出现了风险情绪，但对贵金属的需求依然强劲。【原文：Gold continued to claw back losses after its recent drop, showing demand for the precious metal remains strong despite a risk-on mood in wider financial markets.】

item.title: 人工智能需求强劲，联想营收超预期
item.description: 得益于全球个人电脑市场份额的增长和人工智能服务器的强劲需求，联想集团有限公司公布的季度收入好于预期。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd. posted better-than-expected quarterly revenue thanks to its increased market share in global PCs and robust demand for AI servers.】

item.title: 美国产品库存增加，石油创一周最大跌幅
item.description: 在美国燃料库存增加后，石油创下一周来最大跌幅，同时投资者也在关注定于周五生效的对俄罗斯两大生产商的制裁所带来的影响。【原文：Oil held the biggest decline in a week after US fuel inventories rose, while investors monitor the fallout from sanctions on two major Russian producers that are scheduled to take effect on Friday.】

item.title: 港股反弹面临 250 亿美元禁售挑战
item.description: 香港股市的反弹面临着迫在眉睫的考验，因为年底股票销售限制到期有可能刺激股市波动，促使投资者锁定收益。【原文：Hong Kong’s stock rally faces a looming test, as year-end expirations of share‑sale restrictions threaten to spur volatility and prompt investors to lock in gains.】

item.title: 亚洲的货币防卫战储备已增至 8 万亿美元
item.description: 亚洲的外汇储备已飙升至近 8 万亿美元，这为从东京到孟买的各国当局在需要加强本国货币防卫时提供了充足的弹药。【原文：Asia’s foreign-exchange reserves have surged to almost $8 trillion, providing the authorities from Tokyo to Mumbai with ample ammunition if they need to step up defending their currencies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行监管机构警告海外风险升高
item.description: 澳大利亚银行业监管机构表示，澳大利亚金融体系面临的海外风险加剧，当前的地缘政治动荡仍将持续一段时间。【原文：Risks to Australia’s financial system from overseas are heightened and current geopolitical volatility will remain for some time, according to the nation’s banking regulator.】

item.title: 加密货币混合器联合创始人在洗钱案中被判四年监禁
item.description: 在特朗普政府罕见的加密货币起诉中，一名比特币钱包运营商被指控帮助暗网非法交易洗钱 2 亿多美元，并因此被判四年监禁。【原文：One of the rare cryptocurrency prosecutions under the Trump administration led to a four-year prison term for a bitcoin wallet operator accused of helping launder more than $200 million from illegal dark web transactions.】

item.title: 英伟达预测乐观，美股期货大涨：市场综述
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的强劲财报使美国科技股在盘后交易中走高，延续了华尔街的涨势，并帮助亚洲股市早盘上涨。美元上涨，国债全线下跌。【原文：Robust Nvidia Corp. earnings sent US tech stocks higher in after-market trading, extending a rally on Wall Street and helping set up Asian stocks for early gains. The dollar rose while Treasuries fell across the curve.】

item.title: 英伟达销售预测带来宽慰，人工智能相关股票反弹
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）发布的财报缓解了人们对人工智能热潮持久性的担忧，周三，人工智能领域各公司的股票在延时交易中上涨。【原文：Shares of companies across the artificial intelligence landscape rose in extended trading on Wednesday after Nvidia Corp. reported results that eased concerns about the durability of the AI boom.】

item.title: 美国与 G42 达成人工智能芯片销售协议，阿联酋公司获胜
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，美国已同意批准向阿联酋人工智能公司 G42 出售先进的人工智能半导体，这极大地推动了海湾国家成为该技术领域强大参与者的雄心。【原文：The US has agreed to approve sales of advanced AI semiconductors to the Emirati AI firm G42, according to two people familiar with the matter, in a major boost for the Gulf nation’s ambitions to be a formidable player in the technology.】

item.title: 日元、债券和股票下挫，高市的市场欣喜终结
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈面临着她的首次重大市场考验，因为对政府即将出台的经济刺激计划的不安情绪有可能会破坏她的当选所引发的反弹。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is facing her first major market test as jitters over the government’s impending stimulus package threaten to derail the rally her election helped ignite.】

item.title: 特朗普计划发布 "创世使命"，推动人工智能发展

item.title: 纽约市公交系统利用运营节余削减预算缺口
item.description: 纽约市的交通网络是美国最大的交通网络，它预计通过削减开支和房地产税的潜在反弹，在三年内将运营预算赤字缩减 4.18 亿美元。【原文：New York City’s transit network, the largest in the US, expects to shrink operating budget deficits by $418 million over three years by cutting expenses and with a potential rebound in real estate tax collections.】

item.title: B.B. Riley 再次赢得延期，继续在纳斯达克上市
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc.称，纳斯达克给了该公司更多的时间来完成其缺失的季度财务报告，让这家经纪交易商继续在证券交易所上市，直到其补齐逾期未交的文件。该公司股价在纽约交易中下跌了 15%。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. said Nasdaq gave the firm more time to complete its missing quarterly financial reports, keeping the broker-dealer listed on the stock exchange until it catches up on overdue filings. The shares fell 15% in New York trading.】

item.title: 惠誉称，BDC 在 2026 年将面临信用质量上升的压力
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周三发布的一份报告称，随着利差进一步收窄，预计实物支付量将上升，公开上市的商业开发公司明年将面临越来越大的压力。【原文：Publicly-traded business development companies can expect growing pressure next year, with payment-in-kind volume predicted to rise as spreads tighten further, according to a Fitch Ratings report on Wednesday.】

item.title: Blackstone、Neuberger 承诺向 Trilantic 基金出资 6 亿美元
item.description: Blackstone Inc.和 Neuberger Berman 将向 Trilantic Capital Partners 的一个多资产延续基金投入至少 6 亿美元，该基金的折扣很低，一直受到无法为新交易筹集资金的其他公司的密切关注。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and Neuberger Berman are committing at least $600 million to a deeply discounted multi-asset continuation fund from Trilantic Capital Partners that has been keenly watched by other firms unable to raise money for new deals.】
